subject: Fwd: Thank you for your recent loan request, we accepted your refinance loan request
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this offer will expire TONIGHT):
$355,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this quick form... 
Do not worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://bathaeonand.com/
